content.en: AI-optimized networks: Researchers are exploring the use of deep reinforcement learning algorithms to improve routing and control strategies in software-defined networks. These algorithms, such as NetworkAI, DROM, and TIDE, are being developed to dynamically optimize routing, enable scalable routing, and improve quality of service in these networks. By leveraging the power of artificial intelligence, these algorithms have the potential to enhance the efficiency and performance of software-defined networks.
content.da: AI-optimerede netværk: Forskere undersøger brugen af dyb forstærkningslæring algoritmer for at forbedre routerings- og kontrolstrategier i softwaredefinerede netværk. Disse algoritmer, såsom NetworkAI, DROM og TIDE, bliver udviklet til dynamisk at optimere routing, muliggøre skalerbar routing og forbedre servicekvaliteten i disse netværk. Ved at udnytte kraften af kunstig intelligens har disse algoritmer potentiale til at forbedre effektiviteten og ydeevnen af softwaredefinerede netværk.
